MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G81 postcode area of Clydebank. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6pm to safely carry out repair work on our underground cable network for properties in Vangaurd Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:29 PM on Sunday, 31 January 2021
